body.name: Dash Cam, 3 Channel Dash Cam, 1080P Dash Cam Front and Inside, Triple Dash Cam, Dash Camera with 32GB Card, HDR, G-Sensor, 24Hr Parking, Loop Recording
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 45 mins
features: TRIPLE DASH CAM: The 3 channel dash cam is designed to simultaneously monitor both inside and outside the car while driving the car with audio, features with a 170 wide-angle front camera + 150°Cabin + 150° waterproof rear camera, providing all-around protection. The Screen made by IPS panel, It allows you to see a clear picture at any angle without any reflection or blurring.
G-SENSOR & PARKING MONITOR: Built in G-sensor, which will activate emergency recording and lock the recorded videos when it detects sudden shakes or collisions while your car is stationary.

LOOP RECORDING: The loop recording function makes the newly recorded video will automatically overwrite the oldest video when when storage limit reached, the video can be recorded in 1, 3 minute intervals. This car camera is already equipped with a 32GB SD card, you do not need to buy this card additionally.

CLEARER NIGHT VISION & SUPERIOR WDR TECHNOLOGY: The interior facing camera design with 4 infrared LED lights, which can accurately capture important footage clearly under low light conditions. The superior HDR technology allows the camera to perform optimally in any lighting situation by adjusting the exposure to create balanced images and footage.

EASY INSTALLATION AND OPERATION: It is plug and play, very convenient. Simple to mount the 3 channel dash cameras on the windshield which makes for an overall straightforward installation process. Easy to understand display and friendly key settings make it easy for you to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great 3-Channel Dash Cam!
reviews.reviewText: Works well with my Tucson.Easy to set up, affordable price, and very good view from all directions.This camera has everything needed, shows 3 ways very clear picture and also sound.Will be buying again soon for another vehicle.Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Cam! Reasonable Cost!
reviews.reviewText: This have been a good dash cam. I Uber and I can clearly see my backseat. Easy to install, good picture quality, and it covers all angles. Just trying to figure out how to make the screen to constantly run but it do constantly records. Overall I love this dash cam bought a second one for my other car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cam works well
reviews.reviewText: So far so good with my dash cam. It was simple to install the dash cam (I am not using the backup cam that came with it since my car already has one). The camera comes on when I start the vehicle and the videos have all been clear. The screen does not constantly run, probably to not cause a distraction, but the unit is still recording. It is a nice little camera. I've only used it a few times in the dark. It does record but picture is not as clear in night vision as I need. There may be a setting that will make it better but I have not investigated that yet. The screen is small and installed on the passenger side so I would need to unmount to see the screen. Overall, I am happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The daschcam is pretty nice. It's a little complicated to set up, not bad though, if you have someone to help you it's good. I haven't been in an accident yet, so I haven't had the chance to use it- but there have been several close calls. With the buttons- it's a bit confusing, but it's easy to learn once you get the hang of it. The quality is nice, and I would say it's a trust worthy cam. Haven't installed the rear one in yet, but you will probably need someone else to help you install it unless you know your way around a car. Setting it up is decent, it's honestly great for the price, and I would say it's worth the money. It's not some super star dashcam, it's decent quality, and it works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top-Notch Dash Cam for Peaceful Driving
reviews.reviewText: I recently got the SUVCON Dash Cam and it's a game-changer! The high-resolution lens captures clear footage, even in low light. With a wide-angle view, it ensures nothing goes unnoticed.Setting up was a breeze thanks to the user-friendly interface.The loop recording and ample storage on the included microSD card make managing footage seamless. Plus, its durability ensures it stands up to daily wear and tear.In summary, the SUVCON Dash Cam offers exceptional performance, user-friendly features, and robust durability, making it a must-have for safer and stress-free driving. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and nice quality dash cam
reviews.reviewText: I research a lot of cameras before deciding to purchase this one . It was very ease to connect . The quality of the video is clear. Front camera is like 2 in 1 camera . So you can have a full view of the driver and passenger also . I’m very pleased with the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its a good dashcam, for the price.
reviews.reviewText: First I would like to say the dash cam works very well, haven't had any problems and the video quality is good but the compression is sometimes a bit much. However, the plates and such are still very readable so it checks off that. Next the accelerometer detection works very well and is configurable, this is pretty nice because this means the dash cam doesn't need to be connected to the battery for catching hit and runs. Lastly the only reason I have it a 4 star is because of the GUI/software is just clunky and the buttons do not align with the legend on the screen, however its very easy to learn what the buttons do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peace of Mind on the Road: My SUVCON Dash Cam Experience
reviews.reviewText: I recently installed the SUVCON 3 Channel Dash Cam in my car, and it has significantly upped my sense of security while driving. Here's what I love about it:360° Coverage: This cam covers all angles - front, cabin, and rear - ensuring no blind spots. Whether I'm cruising down the highway or parked, I feel like I have an extra set of eyes around my car.G-Sensor Reliability: The G-sensor feature is a lifesaver. It automatically locks footage during sudden movements or impacts, which is incredibly reassuring, especially when I'm not around my car.Hassle-Free Loop Recording: It continuously records and overwrites old footage. The fact that it came with a 32GB card was a pleasant surprise, eliminating the need for immediate additional purchases.Night Vision Clarity: The night vision is crystal clear, capturing every detail even in low light. It's comforting to know that my night drives are as well recorded as day ones.Easy Setup: Installation was a breeze - a simple plug-and-play setup. The user-friendly interface makes it easy to operate, even for someone not very tech-savvy.In Summary: The SUVCON Dash Cam is an essential addition for any driver. It's like having a vigilant co-pilot, providing a comprehensive safety net with its wide coverage and smart features. For anyone looking to enhance their car's safety features, I highly recommend it.
